name: Mr. Steal Your Limbs
description:
What’s the only thing that can get in the way of scientific discovery? A lack of limbs! Frankenstein finds himself in this very predicament, and his only choice is to steal them. 

Help Frankenstein collect limbs for his monstrous creation from some not so willing adversaries. With increasing difficulty, he’ll challenge a series of “limb collectors”. He’ll go through hell and back, but it’s worth it in the name of science!
